We havenâ€™t shared stats in a little bit.

We are currently at 380 Users (19 beta testers, 361 stable users)

12 five star ratings, 9 of which have reviews/comments.

As we say a lot  - if you rate the extension the more visibility it gets in the chrome web store.  The more users, the more people interested in contributing, the faster new features get added.
